text: Thomas James Fleming (July 5, 1927 - July 23, 2017) was an American military historian and historical novelist. He was born in Jersey City, New Jersey. Fleming was the author of over forty nonfiction and fiction titles. His work was about the particular interest on the American Revolution, with titles such as Liberty! The American Revolution And The Future Of America, Duel: Alexander Hamilton, Aaron Burr, and the History of America and Washington's Secret War: The Hidden History of Valley Forge.
